metadata.description:
42 pages!
Saturday mornings spent watching cartoons with a bowl of Choco Puffs are history, now that Jake has superpowers! After a high school prank goes wrong, Jake finds himself with super speed. Now, when his city needs him he dons the yellow and red and becomes Redfoot! Unfortunately, the city's other hero, Cosmic Captain, doesn't answer to the same higher calling. For the Captain, it's all about the fame and recognition of being a hero. Now, with Cosmic Captain gaining all the headlines, Jake begins to question what it really means to be hero.
metadata.name: Redfoot
